# generalizeR

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->


The goal of generalizeR is to guide K-12 researchers through the process of (1) designing a sample recruitment plan with generalization in mind and (2) reporting where the results of a study may (or may not) generalize well. 

## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("NUstat/generalizeR")
```

The package is not yet available on CRAN.
